We petition that the government to allow the Reuse of Graves.

This would be to act on the recommendation of the Select Committee Inquiry of 2001 which found that: “A complete review of the law relating to burial and cemetery management, including churchyards, is required”.

It also said: “If the public are to continue to have access to affordable, accessible burial in cemeteries fit for the needs of the bereaved, there appears to be no alternative to grave reuse”.
